00008 LocalFile::LocalFile(string Path) {
00009 
00010         m_localFilePath = Path;
00011 
00012         size_t lastSlash = Path.find_last_of("/");
00013 
00014         if (lastSlash == string::npos) {
00015 
00016                 lastSlash = 0;
00017 
00018         } else {
00019 
00020                 //Increment by 1 to remove the / from the string
00021                 lastSlash++;
00022 
00023         }
00024 
00025         m_localName = Path.substr(lastSlash, Path.length());
00026         printf("m_localName %s\n", m_localName.c_str());
00027 }

00041 bool LocalFile::exists() {
00042 
00043         struct stat fileInfo;
00044 
00045         //If stat returns 0 something by that name exists
00046         if (stat(m_localFilePath.c_str(), &fileInfo) == 0)
00047                 return true;
00048 
00049         return false;
00050 }
00051 
00052 unsigned long LocalFile::length() {
00053 
00054         struct stat fileInfo;
00055 
00056         //If stat returns 0 something by that name exists
00057         if (stat(m_localFilePath.c_str(), &fileInfo) == 0) {
00058 
00059                 return fileInfo.st_size;
00060 
00061         }
00062 
00063         return 0;
00064 }
